context: Where can I get my Quadrant repair. It just stop working?
response: I'm not quite sure. Try contacting Saitek or view there website to troubleshoot it to see if it may just be a driver issue or a software issue.

context: Can you Turn off the BackLit LED anytime or no? And does the mouse have LED as well. Can I turn that off as well. What is the warranty on this?
response: You can turn the led off. However, it makes the keys super hard to see. The mouse does have LEDs. All the blue you see in the picture is from an LED.

The PC/PS3 switch is on the left back, just below programmable button #6.  The PS3 button must work for PS3 since I inadvertently bumped it, early on before realizing it was there, and the PC stopped responding to the joystick.
no I tried and would like my money back.

context: Will this game spoil anything for someone who has only watched up to episode 170?
response: This game continues from where the anime is at, and it appears to be showcasing what will happen in the future. I highly recommend you watch up to episode 650, and you'll be safe! Enjoy the show and journey, cause this game will offer a lot of it. ^_^
I honestly could not tell you, my guess would be if your tv has the appropriate plug in space.and nintendo 64 is compatible to the other end it would probably work. Wish I could be more sure for you.

context: How is the Internet functionality? Looking to give to daughter in lieu of a tablet. She would use it to listen to YouTube, play Internet games, etc.
response: The tablet would be a better choice as the 3ds cannot do those things.

context: Can this game be played on a playstation 2? I don't know anything about video games & consoles.
response: No. It is for the ps3 only.

context: If my son gets this game & a 3D-XL for Xmas, but the other has only a regular DS-XL, can they still play together? or do both need 3DS players?
response: They both need 3ds systems. To my knowledge 3ds/2ds systems are backward compatible but a Nintendo DS can't run a 3ds game.

context: I am having trouble connecting. I followed the short instructions in the package but cannot get controller to charge or connect.
response: Connect with a USB cord or if that dnt work turn the controller over and get something small with a point n that small hole it should reset the controller then try to use a USB cord again

context: if i buy fifa from usa would it work in uk ps4 console
response: No it wouldn't work as they have regional restrictions

context: do you have to use origin or can you use steam to paly the game
I don't want Steam on my computer.  Does Civilization IV require Steam and/or an internet connection to play single-player game?
response: I don't blame you.  I don't like to use Steam either.  Luckily you don't need to have Steam running or installed to run the game, and as far as I know, you can play the single player offline.

context: is Diablo III: Reaper of Souls Collector's Edition work with standard diablo 3 ?
response: I had diablo 3 collector's edition but I think it works with the regular edition too.  I hope this helps
If you are using a US account. Then yes.

context: Does this headset have an adapter to allow it to connect to a headphone jack on a TV/phone to double as a headset for watching movies, music etc.
response: Yes. The transmitter does have a 3.5mm port to allow it to connect to any portable device or T.V.

context: If I own a PS3 is it even worth owning a Vita right now because all I see are mostly multiplats I can get on PS3.
response: Its worth owning one now you can take those ps3 games with you on the go!
